attributes.action: change the houseing act in arun district
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the way arun runs there houseing policy is a complete mess...the are more people haveing to pay for private houseing than there is in council property...and as for the homeless people iv been homeless a few times and they say that homeless men aint at risk..a little assesment here...lots of drunken yobs comeing out of pubs and clubs see a homeless person whats gonna happen if there bored..beat up on him ..or as we all know now if they have a knif lets stab him or her...as its one less homeless person...this has to change and we all need equal rights on houseing...arun council say they aint got many propertys well maybe they need more money from the goverment to build more as they are a council its there job to build homes..and as they still take our COUNCIL TAXES we are intitled to be housed..iv lived in the arun area for over 10 yrs and always been turned down just for the waiting list until just lately..but now been told it could take even more yrs to be housed...IT HAS TO CHANGE NOW

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
